short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The FootPrint Extension is a browser tool that allows users to automate their actions and convert them into Playwright scripts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate your browser actions and effortlessly convert them into Playwright scripts with just a few clicks using the FootPrint extension.

Here's how it works:

1. Install FootPrint - Add the extension to your Chrome browser with a single click.
2. Record Your Actions - Simply browse the web and perform the actions you want to automate, such as clicking, typing, and scrolling.
3. Real-time Script Generation - As you interact with the web page, FootPrint intelligently records and generates a Playwright script in real time.
4. Stop Recording - When you're done, click the stop button, and a screen will pop up displaying the generated Playwright script.
5. Copy the Script - With a click of a button, FootPrint automatically copies the entire Playwright script to your clipboard.
6. Paste and Test - Paste the script into the FootPrint platform or your preferred testing environment to verify the functionality of your web application.

Why choose FootPrint?

- Effortless Automation: Let FootPrint do the heavy lifting by tracking your actions and converting them into Playwright scripts with real-time script generation.
- Time-saving and Efficient: Say goodbye to time-consuming script writing. FootPrint automates the process, allowing you to focus on other important tasks.
- Comprehensive Testing: Ensure your web application works flawlessly across different browsers and devices by testing with Playwright.
- User-Friendly Interface: FootPrint's intuitive interface makes recording, generating scripts, and testing a breeze, even for non-technical users.

Notes : 

The FootPrint extension is available free of charge. However, to access its enhanced testing capabilities, an account on the FootPrint platform is required. Sign up on our website to unlock the full potential of FootPrint.

For optimal performance and stability of your scripts, we recommend adding data-test-id attributes to your elements within the project. Utilize FootPrint's complimentary ID Generator for this purpose.

This product includes open-source software components from various sources. We gratefully acknowledge these developers for their valuable contributions to the open-source community. Detailed information regarding their licenses and copyrights can be found in our documentation
